title: 'Golden Girls' Ornaments Are, Without a Doubt, the Most Perfect Christmas Tree Decor
text:
Every day is a great day to honor The Golden Girls, and yes, even on Christmas Day. Whether you consider yourself a Dorothy, Blanche, Rose, or a Sophia, you’ll love glancing over at your Christmas tree and spotting your favorite four ladies celebrating the holiday right there with you—and livening up your living room’s focal point in the process.

If you happen to be on the hunt for Golden Girls-inspired gifts, these one-of-a-kind ornaments are the perfect last-minute presents to put under the tree for a dedicated fan. Family and friends will probably be talking about them for years to come and who knows, you might even find yourself wanting your own set of Golden Girls ornaments to go along with your Golden Girls Chia Pets, ‘cause why not?!
